TopicTitle: Too many buttons! (Too many mods? he he)

Articles.Content:
I just refreshed most my mods to the latest versions, got rid of some added a few others. My problem is that my button bar is totally out of control! Is there a mod that lets me pick and choose which of these are displayed?

Also while I'm at it,

You want to install a mod to manage your mods?

For the first question, I don't know. The second is definitely Extraplanetary Launchpads.
You might try blizzy's Toolbar mod. It is an alternative toolbar API. Not every mod will support it, but it will probably be enough to get things out from under the other UI elements.
Yep, Blizzy's toolbar is the way to go. You can also check out QuickHide:

Yep, Blizzy's toolbar is the way to go. You can also check out QuickHide

Thank you! This looks exactly like what I am looking for!

And thanks Starwhip, now I know where to look.
